reference.shortdesc: The synph element identifies a syntax phrase.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: The synph element is used when a complete syntax diagram is not needed, but some of the syntax elements, such as kwd, oper, or delim are used within the text flow of the topic content.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The synph is specialized from ph. It is defined in the syntax diagram domain module, which is a specialization of the programming domain module.
